subject: Hos to use a JUnit 4 listener in maven-surefire-plugin
msgSnippet: Hi, In my maven pom.xml I want to register a JUnit 4.X listener to maven- surefire-plugin to notify that my all jUnit 4.X testcases completed their executions.
messageBody:
Hi,

In my maven pom.xml I want to register a JUnit 4.X listener to maven-
surefire-plugin to notify that my all jUnit 4.X testcases completed
their executions. TestNG provide this facility, but its prohibited here
to use TestNG.

Sudarshen
